Talk_Guard_17:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Tired_01>I wanted to learn to read the Zonai script from<clr:0000>
Tauro<clr:ffff>, but I should wait until my current assignment
is finished with.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_Guard_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Did you know five—count 'em, <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff>—ruins
fell around here? They're called the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>We discovered <clr:0000>stone slabs<clr:ffff> inside each
of 'em <clr:0000>inscribed with Zonai writing<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Each slab tells a different story. The one
in this ruin is about...let's see...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Wind, fire, water, lightning, time...and...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Light! That was it. <sp:5:1:0>It says that people with
powers like those could amplify them with
secret stones to perform great deeds.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you want more than a synopsis, you
can take a look at the <clr:0000>translated text<clr:ffff>
posted near the slab.
Talk_Guard_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You come all the way out here to see the
Ring Ruins? I'll be!

Watch your step so you don't fall into that
<clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> or get personal with any <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>If you just can't help yourself gloom-wise,
look for our resident gloom specialist,
<clr:0000>Ebah<clr:ffff>, by the tents.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Anyhow, the chief here is determined to
keep the ruins open for viewing.

Just steer clear of the <clr:0000>stone slabs <clr:ffff>in the
Ring Ruins. Can't replace those!
Talk_Guard_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You don't see many travelers come visit
the Ring Ruins more than once.

Watch your step so you don't fall into that
<clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> or get personal with any <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>If you just can't help yourself gloom-wise,
look for our resident gloom specialist,
<clr:0000>Ebah<clr:ffff>, in his tent.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>You're free to look around as you please,
but keep your hands off the <clr:0000>stone slabs<clr:ffff>
inside the ruins.
Talk_Guard_11:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>What a shame we <clr:0000>can't enter that floating ring<clr:ffff>. I bet
there's a slab in there packed with juicy information.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_Guard_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're free to look around as you please,
but keep your hands off the <clr:0000>stone slabs<clr:ffff>
inside the ruins. Can't replace those!
Also, watch your step so you don't fall
into that <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> or get personal with
any <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>If you just can't help yourself gloom-wise,
look for our resident gloom specialist,
<clr:0000>Ebah<clr:ffff>, in his tent.
Talk_Guard_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Did you know five—count 'em, <clr:0000>five<clr:ffff>—ruins
fell around here? They're called the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>We discovered <clr:0000>stone slabs<clr:ffff> inside four
of 'em <clr:0000>inscribed with Zonai writing<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Each slab tells a different story. The one
in this ruin is about...let's see...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Wind, fire, water, lightning, time...and...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Light! That was it. <sp:5:1:0>It says that people with
powers like those could amplify them with
secret stones to perform great deeds.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want more than a synopsis, you
can take a look at the <clr:0000>translated text<clr:ffff>
posted near the slab.<sp:0:4:0>The writing is so ancient that I couldn't
begin to tell you how to read it.<sp:0:4:0>But Tauro is pretty well-versed in Zonai
stuff, so I had him write it down for me.
